name: Shell Alexia 40 XC
description: A high performance cylinder lubricant for two-stroke, low-speed, diesel engines using Very Low Sulphur Fuel Oil (<0.5%).
category: Oli motore - Cilindro e sistema di lubrificazione

marketing: Efficient on-board operations: No need to switch between high- and low-BN lubricants; fully miscible and compatible with all other cylinder lubricants in the Shell portfolio.
